Title: Permanently extends the time period for certain actions for an injury or death caused by contact with or exposure to phenoxy herbicides for certain persons
Summary: Permanently extends the revival of time barred causes of action for an injury or death caused by contact with or exposure to phenoxy herbicides for those persons serving as members of the armed forces in Indo-China from February 28, 1961 through May 7, 1975.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 266 of the laws of 1981, amending the civil practice law and rules relating to time limitations, in relation to permanently extending time limitations for certain actions
